page.title: 17BUSINESS,CLUBS&SOCIETIES '85
page.content: {Business:}Village Stores & Post Office Lodsworth Garage, Polo Shop, Saddler, Builders & Decorators, Timber Yard, Langham Stables for polo horses.{ {Farms:}Boughton,Gosdenheath,Grittenham Heath End,Hurlands,Manor,Moor,Moorland Netherlands,River,Southdean,Upperton. {Public Houses:}Lickfold Inn,Hollist Arms, Halfway Bridge Inn,The Three Moles. {Clubs:}Lodsworth Sports and Social Club,Cricket,Stoolball,Football Clubs, Youth Club, Seniors Club. {Churches:}St Peter's & St James', bellringers, Wives Fellowship {Societies:}Horticultural Society, Drama,Lod Valley Association,Minibus for the Disabled. {Government:}The Parish Council, Chichester District Council, West Sussex County Council. Chichester Constituency:Member, Anthony Nelson.
